home.title: lsw1.dev
home.subtitle: The official site for the LEGO Star Wars: The Video Game speedrunning community. Track your progress and try to earn a stud on the leaderboards!

auth.displayNameDescription: This will be shown on leaderboards and your profile. Must be unique.
auth.invalidEmailMessage: Please enter a valid email address.
auth.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
auth.passwordNoUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter.
auth.passwordNoLowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter.
auth.passwordNoNumber: Password must contain at least one number.
auth.displayNameTakenMessage: This display name is already taken. Please choose a different one.
auth.passwordMismatchMessage: Password and confirmation password do not match.
auth.displayNameUnavailable: Display name is already taken. Please choose another.
auth.loginError: Failed to log in. Please check your credentials.
auth.signupError: Failed to create account. Please try again.
auth.passwordResetSent: Password reset email sent! Check your inbox.
auth.passwordResetError: Failed to send password reset email.
auth.pleaseLoginToSubmit: Please log in to submit a run.
auth.authenticationTimeout: Authentication timeout. Please check your connection.
auth.failedToCheckDisplayName: Failed to check display name availability. Please try again.
auth.passwordResetEmailSentMessage: If an account exists with this email, you will receive password reset instructions.
auth.youHaveBeenLoggedIn: You have been logged in successfully.
auth.accountCreatedSuccessfully: Your account has been created successfully.

submit.title: Submit Run
submit.error: Failed to submit run. Please try again.
submit.pleaseFillAllRequiredFields: Please fill in all required fields.
submit.pleaseSelectSubcategory: Please select a subcategory for this category.
submit.pleaseSelectLevel: Please select a level for Individual Level or Community Gold runs.
submit.pleaseEnterSecondPlayerName: Please enter the second player's name for co-op runs.
submit.videoProofRequired: Video proof is required for this category.
submit.playerDoesNotHaveAccount: does not have an account. Please create the player account first, or use the Admin panel to add the run manually.
submit.timeStartsWhen: Time starts when you select "New Game".
submit.timeEndsWhen: Time ends when you lose control of your character.
submit.codesNotAllowed: Using codes in the diner is not allowed.
submit.usbLoaderProhibited: Runs done with a USB loader are prohibited.
submit.swissAllowed: Runs using Swiss to launch the game are allowed.
submit.debugMenuProhibited: Runs using the debug menu are prohibited.
submit.videoMustBePublic: Video must be publicly accessible (not private/unlisted).
submit.videoMustShowFullRun: Video must show the full run from start to finish.
submit.videoQuality: Video quality should be clear enough to verify the run.
submit.srcLinkPlaceholder: Optional: Link to Speedrun.com leaderboard entry
submit.player2NamePlaceholder: Enter second player's name for co-op runs

errors.generic: An error occurred. Please try again.
errors.unauthorized: You are not authorized to access this page.
errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.

notFound.heading: Page Not Found
notFound.description: The page you're looking for has been lost in the void. Let's get you back on track!

points.title: Top Players by Studs
points.submitAndVerifyRuns: Submit and verify runs to earn studs!
points.noRunsFound: No runs found for this player.
points.overviewDescription: Studs are awarded for all verified runs across Full Game, Individual Levels, and Community Golds leaderboards. All platforms and categories are eligible for studs. The points system is configurable by administrators.
points.basePointsDescription: All verified runs receive base points. This is the foundation for all stud calculations.
points.rankBonusesDescription: Full Game runs ranked 1st, 2nd, or 3rd receive additional bonus points. Rank bonuses can optionally be enabled for Individual Levels and Community Golds.
points.coopMultiplier: Co-op Multiplier: Applied to co-op runs to split points between players
points.ilMultiplier: IL Multiplier: Applied to Individual Level runs
points.communityGoldsMultiplier: Community Golds Multiplier: Applied to Community Golds runs
points.obsoleteMultiplier: Obsolete Multiplier: Applied to obsolete runs (typically reduces points)
points.formula: Studs = (Base Points Ã— Multiplier) + Rank Bonus (if applicable)
points.formulaNote: For co-op runs, the final result is multiplied by the co-op multiplier to split points between players.
points.noteDescription: Only verified runs count toward studs. Studs are automatically calculated and updated when runs are verified. The exact values for base points, rank bonuses, and multipliers can be configured by administrators in the Admin panel.

live.title: Live
live.timeToStartStreaming: Time to hit the start streaming button!
live.chatAvailableOnDesktop: Chat is available on larger screens. View the stream on desktop to see the chat!
